import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Header from "../../componets/header"; import Seadbar from "../../componets/seadbar"; import {Redirect, Link ,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; class add extends Component { state = { users: [], Authorization : "", loading: true, }; componentDidMount(){ const config = { headers : { Authorization : 'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem('token') } }; axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/user', config).then(res =>{ this.setState({ users : res.data, loading: false, }); }).catch(err=>{ console.log(err) }) } render(){ return (
